description: Saxon sits by a campfire and his mind starts to wander back to the night of the romantic dinner - that never actually happened because his boyfriend was out getting screwed at the rest area on highway 5. Russel shows up, smelling like the men from the truck stop. He falls on the bed and calls for Beau to come fuck him. Saxon decides that this will be the last time, and fucks the hell out of Russel until sweat pours down his face and he explodes all over Russel's back. There's no way Russel could walk away from this fuck, but Saxon decides it's time to hit the road!
title: The Road To Hopeful, Scene #04
